sentences.en: " And then he disappears at the turn of the pass , Leaving behind him only hoof - prints . "
sentences.cn: 山 回路 转不见 君, 雪上空留马行处.

sentences.en: Again high quality of life also get on the hoof!
sentences.cn: 再高品质的生活也得活着 啊 !

sentences.en: He ducked with his head and shoulders, scraped with more advanced hoof, bolted the alcohol.
sentences.cn: 他脑袋和肩膀一缩, 前脚一伸, 把酒囫囵吞下肚.

sentences.en: I think I have seen your hoof in it.
sentences.cn: 我认为我看出了你在这件事里插了一手.

sentences.en: I thought he would show the cloven hoof sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 我早就认为他迟早会原形毕露的.

sentences.en: Let's hoof it to the park.
sentences.cn: 我们步行到公园去 吧.

sentences.en: Let's hoof it to the supermarket.
sentences.cn: 我们步行到超级市场去 吧.

sentences.en: Like a tiger on a deer, with a cloven hoof and with a broken arm!
sentences.cn: 就像老虎对小鹿让你缺胳膊断腿的!

sentences.en: On the hoof every day the last day which see make life.
sentences.cn: 把活着的每一天看作生命的最后一天.

sentences.en: Rat, lingering, looked long and doubtfully at certain hoof - marks deep in the sward.
sentences.cn: 老鼠却在那里流连,久久地迷惑不解地看着深深印在草地上的蹄痕.

sentences.en: Suddenly he heard the quick , short click of a horse's hoof behind him.
sentences.cn: 突然间,他听见背后响起一阵急骤的马蹄的得得声.

sentences.en: The horse snorted and stamped its hoof impatiently.
sentences.cn: 这匹马呼哧呼哧地喷着气,不耐烦地跺着蹄子.

sentences.en: The horses' hooves often could not get a proper grip.
sentences.cn: 这些马的蹄子经常踩不稳。

sentences.en: The last bus had gone so we had to hoof it home.
sentences.cn: 末班公共汽车已经开走了,我们只好走回家.

sentences.en: They are driven to Virginia and sold on the hoof.
sentences.cn: 这些牲口被赶到弗吉尼亚州出售待宰.

sentences.en: They may be entered only on foot, paw or hoof.
sentences.cn: 只有长着脚 、 爪子或蹄子的动物可以进入保护区.

words.tran_cn: 有蹄的；装蹄的；蹄形状的
职业舞蹈家（尤指踢踏舞）；徒步旅行者
用蹄踢；步行（hoof的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 尚未屠宰的，活着的：尚未屠宰的；活着的。尤指用于牛、羊等牲畜

trans.tran_cn: （兽的）蹄，马蹄，〈俚〉（人的）脚，有蹄类动物
trans.tran_en: the hard foot of an animal such as a horse, cow etc
